Description: Do you have a family history of mental illness?
Have you sought treatment for a mental health condition?
Does your mental health condition interfere with your work (if you have one)?
How many employees does your company or organization have?
Is your employer primarily a tech company/organization?
Does your employer provide mental health benefits?
Do you know the options for mental health care your employer provides?
Has your employer ever discussed mental health?
Does your employer provide resources to learn and seek help about mental health issues?
Is your anonymity protected if you use mental health resources?
How easy is it for you to take medical leave for a mental health condition?
Would discussing a mental health issue with your employer have negative consequences?
Would discussing a physical health issue with your employer have negative consequences?
Would you be willing to discuss a mental health issue with your coworkers?
Would you be willing to discuss a mental health issue with your supervisor?
